pkgmetadata.longdescription: R interface to libxslt // A package that provides a) facilities for using XSL within R to transform XML documents via XSL, and b) an extension module for libxslt, the XML-XSL document translator, that allows XSL templates to call R functions from XSL. This is therefore a bi-directional interface between R and XSL, specifically libxslt.
